thread.title: Football: Victor Wanyama nominated for the Premier League African Player for January
thread.title_full: Football: Victor Wanyama nominated for the Premier League African Player for January

title: Football: Victor Wanyama nominated for the Premier League African Player for January
text:
By Game Yetu Saturday, February 4th 2017 at 20:06 
Harambee Stars captain Victor Wanyama has been nominated for the Premier League African Player for January. 
Wanyama is on a three-man shortlist alongside Nigeria’s Victor Moses and Yaya Toure from Cote d’Ivoire. 
Victor Wanyama joined Spurs from Southampton for £11m last July and has been in electric form over recent weeks, netting two goals since his arrival. He's one of those rare players who goes about his business unnoticed. 
According to africanfootball.com website, , organizers New African Soccer are calling on fans to vote for their choice of who is to be crowned EPL African Player of the Month of January.
